name: THEBUMBLESNOUT
description:
AKA DUCKMOM.

WASD - Move.

SpaceBar - Jump.
E - Pickup Item or Drop Held Item.
Left Click - Use Held Item.
MouseScroll - Change Item.

Steal her eggs. 
Then leave. 
Beware the Eye of the Duck.

Game&Art - Jarred
Music and Duck SFX - Deon van Heerden (https://soundcloud.com/deon-van-heerden)
